objectives.name: RepsNext is successfully completed paving the way for our next improvement program

results.name: Coaching plan
results.description: The Coaching plan is implemented and we are able to scale

results.name: Resources Track
results.description: Budget requests submitted after June, 1st go through the trained Resource Reps

scoring.1.0: Budget requests go through that track

results.name: Leadership
results.description: Reps can get initial resources to improve their Leadership skills

results.name: Functional focus plan
results.description: We have a GitHub issue to plan for the future of Reps with an exclusive focus on functional contributions

scoring.1.0: GitHub issue is created and up to date

results.name: Facebook Experiment
results.description: The Facebook experiment is analyzed and being continued if successful

scoring.0.5: Initial evaluation (on the spot) has been done by one Council member

results.name: Communication Improvement
results.description: 2 communication improvements are identified

results.name: Onboarding delay
results.description: It takes a maximum of 2 weeks for new applicants to have their first task assigned

scoring.0.5: It takes a maximum of a month
scoring.1.0: It takes a maximum of 2 weeks

results.name: Core Community Sentiment
results.description: Core community sentiment > 11 NPS (Net Promoter Score)

results.name: Mobilizer Sentiment
results.description: Mobilizer sentiment > 15 NPS (Net Promoter Score)

objectives.name: MozActivate focuses mobilizers on impactful areas

results.name: Feedback form
results.description: General feedback form is used by 100% of MozActivate activities

scoring.0.25: Feedback form is used by 50% of activities
scoring.0.5: Feedback form is used by 70% of activities
scoring.0.75: Feedback form is used by 90% of activities
scoring.1.0: Feedback form is used by 100% of activities

results.name: Metrics
results.description: We have implemented metrics and measurements for the existing MozActivate and to-be-launched activities as well as for the website itself

results.name: Reps Activities
results.description: 70 Reps have organized one or more MozActivate activity

results.name: New Technical Contributors
results.description: Activate is actively engaging 70 new technical contributors

results.name: New Activities
results.description: 2 new activities are launched

objectives.name: The Reps program demonstrates operational excellence in the Mozilla Project

results.name: Q3 Goals
results.description: Goals for Q3 have been set

scoring.1.0: OKRs for Q3 are signed off and published

results.name: Community Development Team OKRs
results.description: We were involved and gave feedback about the Community Development Team OKRs for Q3 as well as the broader Open Innovation ones

scoring.0.3: We had an initial meeting for the Q3 OKRs
scoring.0.6: We have given our input for the OKRs

results.name: Budget Allocation
results.description: The budget allocation for Q3 is finalized and communicated to all Reps

scoring.1.0: We have voted and published the allocation

results.name: Open Tasks per Meeting
results.description: We have on average maximum one open action item from last week before every Council Meeting that is not tracked on GitHub and next steps/blockers are identified

scoring.0.5: We have a maximum of two open action items per meeting
scoring.1.0: We have a maximum of one open action item per meeting

results.name: Future Planning
results.description: We have planned 2 brainstorm sessions for the next improvement program

results.name: Open Innovation Strategy Project
results.description: We have given feedback for Open Innovation’s “Strategy” project and are a valuable source for future consultation for strategy related questions

scoring.1.0: We have given feedback for the project at least once
